CustomField.formula:
OR( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Review Order"),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Review Order"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Review Order") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Schedule CDC Call"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Review Order") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist Completed") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Internal Call Scheduled"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist in Progress") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Internal Call Scheduled"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist Completed") ) )
CustomField.label: HOTCUT Lock
